WorkItem.Description:
Hi. 
 
When opening a page with DataGrid control in it, I get misterious white cells (see attachment). They shouldn't be showed according to my code. Code excerpt is below.
 
                    <Custom:DataGrid x:Name="UlaganjaDataGrid" ItemsSource="{Binding Ulaganja}" DockPanel.Dock="Right" 
                                     AutoGenerateColumns="False" Margin="10,0,0,0" Style="{DynamicResource DataGridDemoStyle}">
                        <Custom:DataGrid.Columns>
                            <Custom:DataGridTextColumn Header="Godina" Binding="{Binding Godina}" IsReadOnly="True" Width="60" />
                            <Custom:DataGridTextColumn Header="Institucija" Binding="{Binding NazivInstitucije}" IsReadOnly="True" Width="Auto" />
                            <Custom:DataGridTextColumn Header="Objekt" Binding="{Binding NazivObjekta}" Width="Auto" IsReadOnly="True"  />
 							<Custom:DataGridTextColumn Header="Izvođač" Binding="{Binding Izvodjac}" Width="Auto" IsReadOnly="True"  />							
                            <Custom:DataGridTextColumn Header="Opis" Binding="{Binding OpisRadova}" Width="Auto" />
                            <Custom:DataGridTextColumn Header="Iznos [kn]" Binding="{Binding UlozenaSredstva, StringFormat=\{0:0\,0.00\}}" Width="100" >
                                <Custom:DataGridTextColumn.CellStyle>
                                    <Style>
                                        <Setter Property="FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment" Value="Right"/>
                                    </Style>
                                </Custom:DataGridTextColumn.CellStyle>
                            </Custom:DataGridTextColumn>
                        </Custom:DataGrid.Columns>
                    </Custom:DataGrid>

Comments.Message: I am facing the same issue. I think the white cells are row headers that are randomly visible for some rows.
